title: Megan Rapinoe reflects on Olympic bronze medal / Eliud Kipchoge gives inspirational message
description: The USWNT came away with an Olympic bronze medal from the women's football at Tokyo 2020. Megan Rapinoe reflects on the ups and down of the tournament. Plus, reigning men's marathon champion, Eliud Kipchoge, sent an inspiring message ahead of the big final race.
itunes:title: Megan Rapinoe reflects on Olympic bronze medal / Eliud Kipchoge gives inspirational message
